Axon.ivy Project Build Plugin

  • Project Reports

project-build:ivy-test-properties

Full name:

com.axonivy.ivy.ci:project-build-plugin:6.1.0-SNAPSHOT:ivy-test-properties

Description:

Shares the classpath of the built ivy project and it's engine as public property and tries to auto-configure maven-surefire-plugin to use this classpath.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 6.0.2.

Parameters

(no parameters)
